findings.title: Improper require statement found in withdraw(uint256) function
findings.description: The function includes an inadequate require statement which allows users with ZERO balance staked to call this function, which is not intended.

findings.title: Total Supply of the token will never reach its full capacity
findings.description: The mint() function includes a require statement to check that the number of tokens being minted never exceeds the cap limit. However, the condition in the require statement uses a strict comparison sign (<) instead of (<=), leading to an unwanted scenario where the total supply of the token will never reach its true capacity.

findings.title: Unintended PUBLIC visibility of functions
findings.description: Functions that are never called throughout the contract should be marked as external visibility instead of public visibility to achieve Gas Optimization.
findings.function: getOwner(), getMinter(), isBlacklisted(), unpauseContract(), claimTokens(), claimAndStakeTokens()
